posts.post_content:

Willing to trade: 
1895 Newsboy Cabinet (Super rare Campbell brand) 
1910 T229 Pet (Boxers and others, all graded) 
1889 SF Hess Boxers (2) 
N174 Old Judge and 1 Gypsy Queen 
A ton of 1910  T219 HLC (all graded)

Hey Wisdom!  

I have these dupes with Tolstoi backs.  I am willing to swap for Tolstoi backs I need if you have any dupes?

here is my want list:  TOLSTOI BACKS NEED -  PATSY BRANNIGAN; CM DANIELS; YOUNG DONAHUE; JOHN FLANAGAN; JACK GOODMAN; AL KAUFMAN; RP WILLIAMS;

let me know if you can help out!  thanks!

Cliff

dupes: Brown; Haywood;fighting dick nelson;okeefe; papke; Stone
